type.name: CookieSetOptions
type.desc: How the cookie will be set.
type.prop: Indicating whether the cookie is to be signed. If this is true, another cookie of the same name with the .sig suffix appended will also be sent, with a 27-byte url-safe base64 SHA1 value representing the hash of cookie-name=cookie-value against the first Keygrip key. This signature key is used to detect tampering the next time a cookie is received.
